basics.name: Edith Cantegrit Alsinet
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Quick learning, adaptative and curiosity are the traits that define me best. The dynamic nature of coding and stepping out of my comfort zone is what keeps me engaged.

work.name: LeadTech
work.summary: Payment orquestrator. Develop a platform that allows financial tasks as real-time transactions monitoring, routing and chargebacks management, all in one place.
highlights: Complexity of financial dashboards to implement
Work on static web page on record time for a marketing campaign

Work in personalization for industry theming

work.summary: I had the chance to work in different projects and for different clients. From an administrative and accounting ERP for non-profit organization to PortAventura's website.

Implementing a new proposal from scratch for PortAventura website
Reusable templates and documenting all UI components
